localeLayoutMetadata.title: ShopFlow - Modern Ecommerce Platform
localeLayoutMetadata.description: Experience the future of online shopping with our feature-rich ecommerce platform

Hero.build_stunning_online_stores: Build stunning online stores with our comprehensive platform featuring advanced analytics, seamless checkout, and powerful admin tools.

Features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
Features.subtitle: From product management to advanced analytics, our platform provides all the tools you need to build and scale your online business.

productManagement.title: Product Management
productManagement.description: Comprehensive product listing with pagination and infinite scroll for a seamless Browse experience.

smartSearch.title: Smart Search & Filters
smartSearch.description: Advanced category filters and intelligent search functionality to help users find exactly what they need.

dynamicCart.title: Dynamic Shopping Cart
dynamicCart.description: Powered by Jotai state management for lightning-fast cart operations and real-time updates.

secureCheckout.title: Secure Checkout
secureCheckout.description: Robust validation and secure payment processing with a comprehensive order management system.

analyticsDashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
analyticsDashboard.description: Real-time sales analytics and order insights to help you make data-driven business decisions.

adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
adminPanel.description: Full CRUD operations for product management with an intuitive administrative interface.

responsiveDesign.title: Responsive Design
responsiveDesign.description: Perfectly optimized for all devices with a mobile-first approach and cross-platform compatibility.

performanceOptimized.title: Performance Optimized
performanceOptimized.description: Skeleton loaders, lazy loading, and optimized animations for a superior user experience.

Demo.title: See It in Action
Demo.description: Experience the power of our platform with interactive demos and real-world examples.

productManagement.title: Intuitive Product Management
productManagement.description: Easily add, edit, and organize your products with our drag-and-drop interface and bulk operations.

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Track sales, monitor inventory, and analyze customer behavior with comprehensive dashboards.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile-First Design
mobileFirst.description: Optimized for all devices with responsive design and progressive web app capabilities.

Cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
Cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using ShopFlow to create amazing online shopping experiences.

Footer.description: The complete ecommerce platform for modern businesses.

DashboardPageMetadata.title: ShopFlow Dashboard - Your Ecommerce Hub
DashboardPageMetadata.description: Manage your ShopFlow ecommerce store with ease. View sales, orders, products, and customer data all in one place. Your ultimate dashboard for growing your online business.

ProductsPageMetadata.title: ShopFlow - Products
ProductsPageMetadata.description: Browse our wide range of quality products.

CartPageMetadata.title: Your Shopping Cart - ShopFlow
CartPageMetadata.description: Review the items you have added to your shopping cart and proceed to checkout.

CartPage.itemRemovedToast: Item has been removed from your cart.

AdminPageMetadata.title: Admin Dashboard - ShopFlow
AdminPageMetadata.description: Manage your store settings, products, and orders from the Admin Dashboard.

ToastMessages.productCreated: New product has been created successfully.

ProductForm.categoriesDescription: Select at least one category for this product
ProductForm.featuredDescription: This product will be featured on the homepage
ProductForm.publishedDescription: This product will be visible to customers

CheckoutPageMetadata.title: Checkout - ShopFlow
CheckoutPageMetadata.description: Complete your purchase securely and easily with ShopFlow. Review your items, choose a payment method, and place your order.

CheckoutPage.cartEmptyMessage: Add some items to your cart before checking out.

OrdersPageMetadata.title: Orders - ShopFlow
OrdersPageMetadata.description: View your orders and track your shipments.

OrdersPage.noOrdersDescription: You haven't placed any orders yet. Start shopping to see your orders here.
